stories.narrative:
In order to 
As a training manager
I want to limit the amount of classes that a trainer can give in a period of time to be limited
stories.name: trainer_reoccurrences.story
stories.scenarios:
Scenario:normal month
Given <trainer> is qualified to give multiple courses
And it is <month>
When <trainer> gave <numberOfClasses> classes this month
Then <trainer> can still give <numberOfClassesLeft> classes this month


Scenario:february
Given <trainer> is qualified to give multiple courses
And it is <month>
When <trainer> gave <numberOfClasses> classes this month
Then <trainer> can still give <numberOfClassesLeft> classes this month


Scenario:the duration of a course influences the amount of courses one trainer can give in one month
Given <trainer> is qualified to give multiple courses
When the course duration is <course_duration_in_days>
And <trainer> gave <numberOfClasses> classes this month
Then <trainer> can still give <numberOfClassesLeft> classes this month


Scenario:holidays
Given <trainer> is qualified to give multiple courses
When the trainer had <holidays> holidays this month
And the course duration is <course_duration_in_days>
And <trainer> gave <numberOfClasses> classes this month
Then <trainer> can still give <numberOfClassesLeft> classes this month

stories.narrative:
In order to 
As a training manager
I want to have the trainers of every class be well considered couples
stories.name: trainer_couples.story
stories.scenarios:
Scenario:many trainers are available
Given the trainings manager wants to select <trainer1> and <trainer2> for a class
And <numberOfTrainers> qualified trainers from other projects are available
When <trainer1> works on <trainer1Project>
And <trainer2> works on <trainer2Project>
Then these trainers are <allowedStatus>


Scenario:only qualified trainers from the same project are available
Given the trainings manager wants to select <trainer1> and <trainer2> for a class
And <numberOfTrainers> qualified trainers from other projects are available
When <trainer1> works on <trainer1Project>
And <trainer2> works on <trainer2Project>
Then these trainers are <allowedStatus>

stories.narrative:
In order to 
As a training manager
I want to invite trainers for a class that are available on the agreed date and time
stories.name: trainer_availability.story
stories.scenarios:
Scenario:>= 1 day training and many trainers are qualified
Given the trainer has a status <status>
When many trainers are qualified to give this course
Then the trainer availability is <availability>
And the action should be <action>


Scenario:<= 0.5 day training and many trainers are qualified
Given the trainer has a status <status>
When many trainers are qualified to give this course
Then the trainer availability is <availability>
And the action should be <action>


Scenario:>= 1 day training and only two trainers are qualified
Given the trainer has a status <status>
And only two trainers are qualified to give this course
And the trainer availability is <availability>
When the action is <action>
And the trainer response is <response>
Then the new action is <new_action>


Scenario:<= 0.5 day training and only two trainers are qualified
Given the trainer has a status <status>
And only two trainers are qualified to give this course
And the trainer availability is <availability>
When the answer to is the trainer available on another moment this day is <available_on_another_moment_this_day>
And the action is <action>
And the trainer response is <response>
Then the new action is <new_action>

stories.narrative:
In order to 
As a training manager
I want to able to manage the trainer experience
stories.name: trainer_experience.story
stories.scenarios:
Scenario:a trainer gives multiple courses
Given <trainer> gave <course> <times_given> times
Then the experience level for this course is <experience_level>


Scenario:a trainer gives only 2 courses
Given <trainer> gave <course> <times_given> times
Then the experience level for this course is <experience_level>


Scenario:re-education is needed
Given <trainer> gave <course> <times_given> times
And the experience level for this course is <experience_level>
When <reeducation>
Then the new experience level before the re-education is <experience_level_before_reeducation>
